update acti_award
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
integral = #{integral,jdbcType=BIGINT},
award_num = #{awardNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
stock = #{stock,jdbcType=BIGINT},
img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
review = #{review,jdbcType=INTEGER},
limit_num = #{limitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},

creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier_id = #{modifierId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update acti_award set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, integral = #{integral,jdbcType=BIGINT}, award_num = #{awardNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, stock = #{stock,jdbcType=BIGINT}, img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, review = #{review,jdbcType=INTEGER}, limit_num = #{limitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receive_num = #{receiveNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, descr = #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier_id = #{modifierId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, integral, remark,review,stock, award_num AS awardNum, img_url AS imgUrl, limit_num limitNum, receive_num receiveNum, type, descr, ext1, ext2 from acti_award aa order by aa.id
